title: Fees and charges
context: ยง286-215 Fees and charges. The director shall establish fair and reasonable fees for applications for approval of plans and specifications for construction or modification of a motor vehicle or class of motor vehicles in Hawaii which will at any time be operated upon the highways as provided in section 286-202(12). [L Sp 1977 1st, c 20, pt of ยง1; am L 1978, c 159, ยง5]
